title: Accumulation of 5-methyltetrahydrofolate and other bioactive compounds, in the course of fermentation of green tea (Camellia sinensis) kombucha
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Samuel de Santana Khan, Vanessa Bordin Vieira, Ana Carolina dos Santos Costa, Arthur Victor da Silva, Allyson Andrade Mendonça, Marcos Antonio de Morais Junior, Dayane da Silva Santos, Alexandre Guedes Torres, Maria Inês Sucupira Maciel, Emmanuela Prado de Paiva Azevedo
